topic.description: Create the most engaging script for mission: Marvel Comics tragedy: THRONE PANEL! Peres finally sits, but 'ACTING PM' floats mockingly above! Tries lifting peace hammer - ALMOST worthy! STRAIN LINES! Operation Grapes panels: MISSILES EVERYWHERE! 'What have I done?!' Qana disaster: SCARLET WITCH-level accident! HORROR! Election battle: BIBI vs PERES! Epic clash panels! '1% MARGIN!' So close! CRUSHING DEFEAT! Lifetime montage panels: Always the bridesmaid. 'MR. PEACE' becomes 'President of... Nothing.' Final panel: Age 93, arc reactor dims... still dreaming. Editor's note: 'The Eternal Runner-Up Rests.'
